TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Add Currently Processed Flat File Name Port

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Fetch folder name, mapping name, workflow name
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_FETCH_MAPPING_INFO

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Fetch folder name, mapping name, workflow name
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_FETCH_MAPPING_INFO

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select W.CLIPPER_WI_REF as AD_ID ,W.VERSION_NUM ,WI.ALLOCATION_TYPE ,T.TASK_NAME ,S.STATUS ,WI.STATUS_DATE as STATUS_TIMESTAMP ,WI.ACTIVELY_WITH as ACTIVE_USER_NAME ,WI.ALLOCATED_TO as ALLOCATE_USER_NAME ,L.LOCATION_NAME ,W.WORKITEM_ID ,TR.ERR_CODE ,TR.TIME_STAMP as TRANSACTION_TIMESTAMP from $$Prefix.WORKITEM_CURRENT_STATUS WI JOIN $$Prefix.TASK T ON T.TASK_ID=WI.TASK_ID JOIN $$Prefix.STATUS S ON S.STATUS_ID=WI.STATUS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN $$Prefix.USER_INFO U ON U.LOGIN_ID= WI.ACTIVELY_WITH or U.LOGIN_ID=WI.ALLOCATED_TO LEFT OUTER JOIN $$Prefix.LOCATION L ON L.LOCATION_ID=U.LOCATION_ID JOIN $$Prefix.WORK_ITEM W ON WI.WORKITEM_ID=W.WORKITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN $$Prefix.TRANSACTIONLOG TR ON TR.KEY =SUBSTR(W.CLIPPER_WI_REF,3) WHERE WI.ACTIVE=1 and S.STATUS not in ('advertiser_approval', 'image_processing', 'completed') and WI.STATUS_DATE>to_timestamp('$$last_curr_status_tms','YYYYDDMMHH24MISSFF')
